website_summaries.verdict: An affordable alternative for anyone who appreciates the aesthetic of a raised watch stand over a flat and boxy bedside clock.
pros: Holds your Apple Watch upright and rubber grip safely secures it in place
cons: Again, you absolutely need the official Apple Watch charger to make use of this stand

customer_reviews.title: Sleek Design.
customer_reviews.text: Design is nice and sleek. Love the aluminum. It's nice because I don't have to remove my case to charge my watch. Most watch stands don't take into account for the possibility that people use cases on their watch. This stand does just that, While there is no good way to use this stand if you wish to use nightstand mode but it is still possible. The Cable management could be tighter. Would be even better if they machined it into the aluminum to better cancel the cord, but over all a good design.
customer_reviews.author: VDubPDX82

customer_reviews.title: Great Designed Charging Stand for Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this Apple watch stand. I got the watch for Christmas and didn't really care for the procedure for charging it. The round charger has to go on the back of the watch, and then the watch just flops on the table. I love how this stand neatly permanently houses the charger, and then I just set the watch on the stand. It was well designed with feet on the bottom so it doesn't move easily. I also like its classy, gold look. I highly recommend this stand for people who like organization in their lives.
customer_reviews.author: Piano Player Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and color
customer_reviews.text: Love this stand! In the pics it looked much taller but then I got it it wasn’t as tall and I thought which I was happy about. It’s cute and small and fits perfectly on my nightstand. You def have to have a stand cuz when charging your watch it just lays flat across the table on the charger and is awkward and takes up a lot of room. Also the company sends a cute thank you note that is a sweet touch. Very happy with this product will order from them again
customer_reviews.author: Vita

customer_reviews.title: Works with Android-powered watches, with a little modification
customer_reviews.text: Since this is nothing more than a glorified aluminum stand with a hole in it, I figured I could make it work with my Android Wear-powered 3rd-generation Fossil Q Explorist watch. The hole that comes in the rubber insert is just a hair too small for the charging puck that came with my watch. I simply took my trusty rotary too with a small grinding bit, and SLOWLY AND CAREFULLY ground away at the channel where the cord goes. It only took a few minutes and presto, the puck for my watch fit perfectly. I simply place it on the charging stand, and it charges my watch without fail. Not just for iFruit, after all!
customer_reviews.author: Michael R. ThenTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Useful.
customer_reviews.text: Fits the charger very snug. Looks great on the nightstand. The stand itself is pretty sturdy and it seems to be made with quality materials. The only thing I didn't like at first was that you can't have it on the stand sideways so it can be on Nightstand Mode, but I connected it to the charger and turned the whole stand on its side. Works well either way. Can't wait to see what other products this company comes out with!
customer_reviews.author: Billy N

customer_reviews.title: Great stand!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really think I needed a stand. I mean, how hard is it to just clip the metal charger to the back of your watch and let it sit on the nightstand? And yet, this simple thing has made charging the watch so much faster and easier. It's now a one-handed procedure (the old way definitely required two hands), both to put it on the stand and to remove it, and it takes up less space than the watch lying on its side. In addition, it looks nice and it wasn't hard to set up. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Chromis

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I’m satisfied with this stand and at the price you can’t expect a lot. I’d spend more money on a heavier version that is more inclined to stay put on my nightstand. It also is a little sensitive to the type of watch band (I have a few) as it may not always seat completely securely the you get the little dinging noise as the watch disconnects/connects with the charger’s magnet. It seems that the heavier the band the better it holds.
customer_reviews.author: jon p thom

customer_reviews.title: DID NOT LAST
customer_reviews.text: Bought this end of December. we are in May and it stopped working a few weeks ago out of nowhere. I woke up one morning, put it on and it said 10% ! It was on the stand the whole night. I thought to myself maybe its not plugged in right. well it was definitely plugged in right. outlet works normal. Definitely the stand. When you place your watch on the stand, it says it is charging. but after maybe 20 min it stops. Very disappointing it lasted only 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Esteffania

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble with your charging unit.
customer_reviews.text: I am going to be in Europe for a couple of weeks and wanted to add a bumper case to the watch face. I wasn't sure if the watch would get a good contact with that extra bit of silicone, but happily, it makes great contact. While I won't be taking this stand in vacation with me, I may continue to use the bumper case after I return.
customer_reviews.author: connie edwards

customer_reviews.title: Have an Apple Watch? Get this!
customer_reviews.text: Before I had to stand from my Apple Watch my Apple Watch which sometimes disconnect from the charger and my watch would be dead in the morning which was a complete bummer because then I could not log any of my workouts for that day as I had to leave my watch at home to charge. Now that I have the stand my watch charger is very easily and I don’t have to worry about the charger coming off I put it right on my nightstand and use it every night.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with this product...If you have an apple watch then you know how the watch may slip off the charger at times and it can become a little annoying. I purchased this product because a friend recommended it and I love it! My watch rest on it while the magnetic charger keeps it from falling off. Also the charging cord hides behind the stand so you can prop it in a place in you living room or bedroom and do not have to worry about looking at cords. I would recommend this product for everyone
customer_reviews.author: CrissyM

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this!!! I was scrolling through amazon and happened to find this product and did not even know a stand like this existed. I was used to just throwing my watching on the counter and fiddling with the charger and now I have this perfect little stand. I have the series 3 rose gold but opted to go for the gold stand (I was worried about the rose gold stand being too pink) and they look great together!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Really works; looks great.
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful and functional stand. It was easy to set up. The watch adheres nicely to the stand. My only reservation is that it's awkward to travel with. I wanted to remove the cord from the charger for travel, but it did not give up the cord easily. I was afraid I would ruin the cord or the charger trying to remove the cord for travel, so I ended up taking the whole thing with me, but it is bulky to pack. For home use, it is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Ortiz-Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My charger port will not come through the hole far enough to attach my watch securely. I think it's charging, go to bed and then get up to a partially charged watch that dies throughout the day. Not happy with this product at all, currently looking for a better solution.
customer_reviews.author: HEATHER A CRAWFORD

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I previously purchased a watch stand charger for my iWatch 5 that contained its own charging wire (i.e. it did not need the apple charging cord that came with the iWatch). That charger sometimes did not charge the iWatch 100% and the iWatch was very warm when I removed it off the charger in the mornings. With this stand, it always charges 100% and is the iWatch is cool to the touch in the mornings since it's using the original Apple cord. My only advice is if you pick a dark color stand, the white charging cord that came with the iWatch will stand out more conspicuously when the iWatch is not on the stand.
customer_reviews.author: JVC

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the watch off surfaces, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This stand holds your watch up so you don’t have to lay it down and take a chance of someone putting something on it. Easy to use, just pop the charger in. Only issue I have, sometimes the charger doesn’t connect with the watch because of how it fits in the hole. Sometimes it moves and then you don’t realize your phone stopped charging until you go to put it on. I like the concept, maybe I just got a flawed one. Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Jen S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!  Even works with a case on!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as part of a gift for my Fiance to go with the Apple Watch Series 3 I bought for him. The apple watch charger inserts easily with a firm push. Watch charges perfectly on the dock (without case) and we have had no issues. If you have a case for your apple watch you may need to fidget with the stand/charger to make sure it charges but after doing so we have had no issues. Sturdy and the Silver looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Backward Charger
customer_reviews.text: If you use a bumper on your phone, no charger will work! The magnet doesn’t meet completely the back of the watch. This little charger will but only if you follow what one of the reviewers did. You remove the holder and place it back backwards. Now place your disc into the holder. It will now grab your watch with a loud click. Always will successfully charge your watch!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJohn C

customer_reviews.title: Cheap wire attach :(
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and easy to charge, But the wire assemble/holder is Not good quality as you see on those pics.
customer_reviews.author: Guss

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.text: The charging stand is very well engineered. It is much smaller than I thought it would be. It’s the perfect size for travel or sitting on your night stand. Appears that it will last indefinitely. The stand holds the charging disk very securely. Also the cord holder works perfectly to keep the cord from being in the way. I would recommend this product to anyone that wants a nice, classy iPhone charger holder. The price is great as well.
customer_reviews.author: J2theDD

customer_reviews.title: A Must Have Accessory for your Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: This charging stand is great. My son had one for his watch so I purchased one for my wife. It is very nice, small foot print and it has 4 rubberized skid resistant feet. The watch fits on this very well. A MUST to have for your Apple watch. It has a little "channel guide" for the charging cable (which it uses the regular charging cable that came with your watch. A Must Have!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My watch was a present. Series 3 in the space gray color, however I would have loved the Rose Gold but there’s no way I’d ever complain about a present that wonderful just because of the color. So I bought a bumper and band in rose gold and then this bad boy in rose gold too to make up for it! Does a great job of holding the charging cable and my watch overnight and is a lot cheaper than other places I’ve seen!
customer_reviews.author: N. Lenich

customer_reviews.title: Wasteful
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy. This product will ultimately ruin your iWatch charger and does not properly align the magnetic port with the back of your watch. This will result in furious frustration the next morning when you realize your watch hasn’t been charging the entire night. The fact that you have to wiggle the watch over the stand to verify if your watch is even flush against the charger is ridiculous. As I’m writing this review, I’m simultaneously ordering a new stand. Do not buy. Disappointing product. Magnetic charger will not fit in inlet unless you literally force it into the hole, and even then it may not charge properly.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Handy little item
customer_reviews.text: This is one of those niche products that Amazon is so good at providing. It keeps my watch supported and up off of the night stand while I sleep, It keeps the watch connected to the charging puck efficiently. It was inexpensive, especially compared to the cost of the watch. It makes the watch easy to read during the night. It is a great little item, and cost me less than a Starbucks Huppachino de Ville.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C. Blagg

customer_reviews.title: Great little stand!
customer_reviews.text: This stand was exactly what I was looking for to prevent my apple watch from sliding around on the charger, falling off the nightstand, and getting damaged. The original apple watch charger is easy to place into the stand and is hidden away in the back for a sleek look. The watch easily magnetizes to the charger and stays in place without risk of damage. I liked mine so much, I ordered a pair for my parents! Colors are nice too and match the watch colors well.
customer_reviews.author: Katie B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Simple, and simply useless if you use a watch case. they're nicely made but utterly useless.
customer_reviews.author: AMC

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient and appealing.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great looking convenient little stand for your apple watch. And it takes your apple magnet charger not a generic one that may not be compatible with the holder which may cause problems later. It gets your watch up off the table, counter, desk, and easier to get ahold of. You can also take the bands off and charge with just the face. I love this item. I will be ordering another for various areas of my house. ***UPDATE*** Bought two more. Love these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: A lady in my office bought a charging stand similar to this one to keep at her desk. I liked it so I looked online for the same one she has or something similar. I couldn't find hers, so I bought this one instead, which I am soooooo glad I did. This one is so much better. The one she got was 4 times more expensive than this one, and didn't have the clips to hide the cord. Also her charger falls out from time to time. They look the exact same, but this one is more efficient and much cheaper. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Austin D Howland

customer_reviews.title: Major design issue
customer_reviews.text: I like the overall design, but there’s a flaw with how the Apple Watch charger integrates into it. The magnetic side of the charger doesn’t sit flush with the opening creating about a half millimeter gap between the watch and the charger. There’s barely enough magnetism to hold the watch in place, but the gap sometimes causes the watch to disconnect while charging.
customer_reviews.author: RB68

customer_reviews.title: Okay
customer_reviews.text: The only things I had a problem with is how the charger head sits in the stand; the space where the charger goes is too deep, therefore you need to kind of push it deeper into the hole (thus putting stress on the charger cord) in order for the magnet to create the connection it needs. Second, there was no adhesive on the bottom of mine, so it doesn’t stay on your table unless you use your own double sided tape.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Needs "heft," especially for heavier watches
customer_reviews.text: Product is a well-done, high-precision, not-unattractive metal stamping with a rubberized insert and "feet" that does the job of holding and charging your watch. What it lacks is "heft," especially for heavier watches. I have a stainless 44mm with a traditional non-Apple metal watchband, and placing/removing the watch on this stand takes a couple of extra seconds (ahem) to make sure the stand doesn't tip over in the process, especially forward. I solved the problem by putting a weight on top of the base.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cummings

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding for Apple watch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new Apple 6 watch. I was tired of old watch occassionally falling off charger when just laying on counter. I got the gold to match my watch (of course!) It is sturdy well made, the finish is excellent and holds watch securely! Perfect!!! Will buy others for gifts!!!
customer_reviews.author: azroamer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish little dock for Apple Watch
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic little stand to hold your Apple Watch in just the right way so that you can put it on a nightstand and touch the watch for time, temperature, and other data. You have to remember to push your magnetic charging device firmly through the hole at the top. Then you just place the watch on the charger and off you go! I got mine in rose gold to match my watch. Silver and other colors are available. For such a low price, this device is the perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: L. Blumenthal

customer_reviews.title: Cute and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't look or feel cheap, it holds the charger nicely. My apple watch kept coming off the charger for some reason or if it was touched the slightest bit, i saw this stand and it's super cute and keeps my watch in place on the charger. Wish I would have found this sooner. 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: raquel.

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under 48 hours
customer_reviews.text: Flimsy piece of crap. The plastic piece that holds the cable is attached to some double-sided tape and it fell off and got lost in under two days.
customer_reviews.author: A. Grishman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.text: Overall I am extremely satisfied with this product. It is all metal and very sturdy. One word of advice, make sure you really push the round charger through the metal housing so it’s sticking out a bit. I started waking up to a dead watch with a message saying charging wasn’t supported this with accessory. I believe it wasn’t making a solid connection. As long as you do that the item functions flawlessly, even with my Rhinoshield case.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good charging dock
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together and works great. I thought my son would have to put it together for me but I had it all together in a minute. I love that I get home put it on the charger and done. I’m glad it’s in its own place and I love that I can look at the time easy from my bed.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Customer 😎

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and durable
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t slide around the counter because it has these little soft grip pads on the bottom of it. I attached a picture above. It is super easy to loop your charger through and it’s even easier to travel with. I thought my watch would slip off but it doesn’t. Nice, easy and a compact device. Makes your charging look better!
customer_reviews.author: Kay 🤩

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stand. My only complaint is that the black rubber that holds the charger on is a bit too thick causing you to be sure that your watch is perfectly centered on the stand. In other words the magnetic part of the watch and charger aren’t strong enough if you don’t center the watch just right.
customer_reviews.author: erica ralston

customer_reviews.title: Holds my Daughter's watch
customer_reviews.text: She was having trouble getting her new watch to successfully connect to the provided charging pad. I purchased this holder, as it allows the watch to dangle over the connector, and seems to be easier for her to connect her watch. Oddly I discovered if I hang it backward, so the velcro band is positioned differently, it connects up for charging even better. She's happy, and her watch is usually charged.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, not sure if it 100% will work
customer_reviews.text: I tried putting my apple watch on the stand to let it charge, it would work for maybe 2 min then suddenly disconnect but reconnect.. I was a little worried leaving it on the stand throughout the evening in case it wouldn't fully charge. I may need to tape the charger to the stand or reposition the watch to make sure it can't disconnect. I want this to work because I believe it can be extremely useful.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: This is a necessity!
customer_reviews.text: This stand is a god send for those who have an Apple Watch. The price is well below the value of the product! Both my husband and I have the same stand, just different colors. We both love them. Let me tell you, before we had our stands, charging our watches was very difficult because the magnetic charger so easily separated from your watch.
customer_reviews.author: Collin & Rebekah Pahle

customer_reviews.title: Best accessory ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best accessory I have purchased for my Apple Watch, I absolutely love it! It’s so nice to have my watch off the counter and it’s super easy to set up too. They are so appreciative of your business as well, they want to know that you are happy and offer an extended warranty if your not. I promise you won’t be sorry it’s the best thing you will purchase for your watch, your watch will thank you as well ;)
customer_reviews.author: Jodi L. North

customer_reviews.title: Design has a ton of potential, you might have to fix a few things yourself
customer_reviews.text: Design is good but the plastic piece holding the cable in the back is not even glued! It has a double sided tape that came off super quick. I read a ton of reviews before buying this one, a few people mentioned their watches not charging, but I have not had that problem at all in about a month using it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Z

customer_reviews.title: Cool item - sleek and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Really like this; so much better than having the charger lie flat on the dresser. Stand is sturdy and doesn’t topple over. Sleek styling. It’s not a negative remark about the product at all, but with the stand you have to make sure your watch is making complete contact with the charger; a few times I wasn’t careful and it stopped charging.
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this sitting on my dresser plugged in. It is SO easy to take my apple watch off and place it on the charger at bedtime. In the morning, it is right there ready for me all charged up. I am really happy that I purchased this. It is easy to use and works fantastically!
customer_reviews.author: Rita Gawronski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I am very surprised at the sturdiness. I was concerned it would be top heavy, but it is perfectly weighted. I did have to remove my soft clear case for it to probably make a connection to the charger. This was not an issue for me, I have the stainless steel and was not planning to keep it on once I received my screen protector anyway.
customer_reviews.author: MELINDA

customer_reviews.title: I Absolutely Love This Stand!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stand because: it’s very clean looking, it matches my watch nicely and holds it safely with any band attached, and it allows me to simply drop my watch down to charge without having to worry much about my aim. My cat kept knocking it over though, so I modified the stand by pressing firmly on the top of the stand to decrease its slope, making it much more sturdy. Also,the clip thad guides the charge cable behind it needs better adhesion to its base.
customer_reviews.author: Christian Ashby

customer_reviews.title: I was a little disappointed when I receive this item
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed when I receive this item, I was expecting a screen protector for the front of y watch so that it would not get scratched or cracked but all I received was a cover for the back of the watch. I thought I read the description of the item wrong but I wet back and read it and it did say that it was a full cover screen protector. Not sure what I should do I guess I will have to count it as a lose because the hassle of returning it is not worth it.
customer_reviews.author: dirtyredd

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: I found this on tik tok and let me tell you, it looks delightful. When my family members saw the stand, they all liked it. I really wanted one because I was always scared of my apple watch falling from the desk or having someone accidentally step on it. It was worth buying one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: L O V E I T
customer_reviews.text: I have the series 5 44mm watch and I love this !! It’s not super big which was what I was worried about because I don’t want much clutter on my nightstand. It’s a aluminum stand and it’s heavy enough to stand still and has anti slip bottom so I don’t have to worry about it falling over or sliding around. Bought the rose gold because I have the rose gold watch and I love it . 11/10 recommend !
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Morales

customer_reviews.title: Be sure your charger is fully seated.
customer_reviews.text: The color is much closer to Rose Gold than the picture appears so that is great. You have to really push the charger high up into the holder for the watch to accept it as an Apple device - when you have an Apple charger. Occasionally I wake and it doesn’t charge because of that. Overall, I am very pleased with this and it beats the heck out of a disk on my night stand!
customer_reviews.author: Carisa

customer_reviews.title: 40mm watch won't charge
customer_reviews.text: After reading other reviews this seems to be an issue with the 40mm watch. It says it's charging but when I wake up in the morning I'm only at 70%. The Apple cord head doesn't seem to seat well enough to come complete thru for the connection. Too bad. It's a nice looking item and I liked the idea of not having the watch fall forward onto the glass.
customer_reviews.author: DebC

customer_reviews.title: Great stand for organizing your cable
customer_reviews.text: Great stand to organize your charging cable, especially the magnetic disc (cable supplied by Apple). Sturdy on a flat surface and does well to cradle the Apple Watch to begin charging. I like the look too. Not great for traveling as it cannot be collapsed, but would take up roughly a 3 inch x 4 inch space. It is solid, so it should not bend if you pack it for a trip.
customer_reviews.author: Dcss64

customer_reviews.title: My watch has a hard time charging on it
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it's the design of where the circle of the charger fits in, or the angle that the watch sits at, but my watch never sits properly on it and I will come back after a few hours to find out my watch hasn't charged
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Nice product and solves a problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought my wife an Apple watch and she loved it. But reaching over to check the time during the night was a hassle. So this solved a problem that, to be honest, I never even anticipated. Holds the watch securely (actually it holds the charger securely - the charger holds the watch) and matches the finish on her watch very nicely. A good product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Gerard Campione

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Does not work. The charger can't go all the way through the hole so the watch cannot magnetize to the charger. Cost to much to ship back so it went in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Wall

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I live this stand and it makes displaying my watch much easier while it’s charging. The only problem i’ve had is the charger slides down sometimes and the watch has trouble catching it to charge. Other than that I am very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Kinsey Morrell

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t allow the charger to get close enough to the watch to charge it. Useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeana

customer_reviews.title: Five stars down to three unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: I had initially given five stars but today the vertical piece that holds the cable in the back just fell off on its own accord. I’m able to stick it back on, but seems like it shouldn’t fall off after only having for a few days and without my even pulling on it. Still a functional stand though and the charger itself stays snug in its clamp and gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Great invention for your apple watch!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic invention for holding your apple watch in a position that lets you see the face while it bed. And keeps charging disc and cord from sliding all over place. Attractive and futuristic looking. Look no further— this is what you want!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth R. Schreiber

customer_reviews.title: Look for something else
customer_reviews.text: There is DOUBLE STICKIE which keeps the cable holder attached to the stand but it’s not sturdy at all and always fall down. This is a serious design flaw and it’s not acceptable at all. Consider something more reliable - there is plenty of choice!
customer_reviews.author: Borislav Donchev

customer_reviews.title: Very nice stand, love it!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE my new stand for my Apple Watch! It is so nice because your watch is placed very nicely over the stand and you can still have it in nightstand mode. The cable is tucked neatly alongside so it’s nice and neat. I am really happy with this purchase, it is the second one I have tried and I’m loving it! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Erica S.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, Affordable, No Substitution Necessary
customer_reviews.text: Received my stand. Connected my apple watch charger. Attachment to stand was a piece of cake. Charges my watch with no issues. Very affordable. Would not consider an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: G9Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the simplest product ever, but I absolutely love it. It’s aesthetically pleasing in color and how it has clips in the back to hide the cord. I use it every night to hold my Apple Watch as it charges.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love that my watch has its own stand now . I use to have a problem with me hitting it off the charger in the middle of the night but now it’s perfect AND Now I don’t need a clock on my night stand
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for! Recently purchased an Apple Watch and needed a charging station my husband purchased one from the Verizon store for $89! I made him return it and ordered his one! Works great. My watch sits perfectly and it’s not a big bulky stand so it doesn’t take much room. Pleased with overall purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.text: This just didn't work 100% of the time with the new watch 4. I had to jiggle it to connect every night and many mornings I'd find that my watch didn't charge. Great design but it has to function as a watch charger.
customer_reviews.author: KMV

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Absoluty love this product. My charger for the watch would always get twisted up & turned the wrong way so it wasn’t ready @ for charging. With this stand problem solved. You just need to push the charger all the way through so your watch will make a good connection while charging.
customer_reviews.author: sam9555

customer_reviews.title: High Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great stand! I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of the material. Has a nice finished look. Edges are super smooth. Definitely looks higher quality than you would think from price point. Fast shipping and great packaging. I will definitely buy from these folks again. Did not think I would enjoy the charging stand as much as I do. Only regret is I did not buy one that would hold my phone too.
customer_reviews.author: Commander 5.7L

customer_reviews.title: great watch stand
customer_reviews.text: Bought to charge my apple watch. It works pretty well. Only downside is the charging cord doesn't stay well on the back. Have to slip it under the stand to secure it.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Radtke

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted for a lot less than getting it at Target
customer_reviews.text: I keep my watch on my desk in the office and had been looking for a stand for a while. I'd priced similar stands at Target for $19.99 so I was happy to find this one for so much less. There was no assembly on it, just put your charger base in and set the watch on it. The one thing I've found to be an issue is the clip on the back that holds the cord keeps coming off. I ended up using a stronger adhesive and haven't had an issue since. Overall I really like the product and would buy more from this seller in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Apple watch stand
customer_reviews.text: Love the stand. It makes charging so easy. Its good looking and takes up very little space. you did a great design job! I mean every word and I rarely write reviews. Can't answer the traveling ease but planning to take to Alaska this summer and it surely looks like it will be no problem. Not good at adding photos but there is a great photo on Amazon Paula
customer_reviews.author: PE

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch Holder
customer_reviews.text: I like this holder because it keeps my watch up off of the counter and the chance of getting wet or something spilling on it. Watch slides on easily. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: cdn from S.A. TX

customer_reviews.title: What an excellent idea.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these. One for me and one for my wife. They work excellently, look nice, and solve a problem of charging the Watch without losing its silly magnetic cord. I'm surprised Apple doesn't make their own version of this. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson&Lindzey

customer_reviews.title: Black rubber for charger port
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t realize from the image that when the watch isn’t resting there, it’s a black rubber thing to connect the round part of the charger. Mostly my fault, but probably wouldn’t have purchased it had that been known. The quality seems fine, especially for the price and I think it will serve it’s purpose just fine. My best friend got me a stand last year for Christmas and it is so convenient to just set it on there to charge, so got this for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this watch stand and it was just what I wanted. It's not too big, I have a limited place to set it up and this fits perfectly. I also received it 3 days before it was scheduled to arrive, which made me happy. I can't attest to its durability since I just got it, but see no reason, at this time, to doubt it will last a long time. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: V. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Customer service changed my 4 star review to 5.
customer_reviews.text: The grip chord holder on the back came off after 2 weeks and it's very light but top heavy so easily to knock over. Not deal breakers for me though. When asked for a review I mentioned the above problems and customer service said improvements were made after I purchased in December and then was given a refund so that I could purchase the new and improved one. I didn't expect that at all and felt like that was above and beyond good customer service. I'll be purchasing the new one soon!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: Does the job! Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Holds my Apple Watch just as it should. It seems magnetic so it can get knocked off, but if it is unbothered, it holds the watch nicely. Greta size, study, totally worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: tonya

customer_reviews.title: Watch Stand Functions Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased one watch stand for me and one for my husband to hold our Apple Watches with Solo bands. The stands arrived quickly. We pushed the watch charging base into the stand holder area for the charger base. The stands hold and allow the watches to charge perfectly with no problems or issues. Will definitely recommend to anyone looking for a good, nicely designed charging stand for their watch.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Not stable; won’t charge watch cus of protective cover
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the way this stand looked because it was sleek and small but I’ve only had problems with it. It tips over super easily because the bottom part of the stand isn’t heavy enough but the most annoying part is, it won’t charge my watch because I have a silicon protector on the watch. I tried multiple times to get it to work but it just isn’t so I will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this item and bad provided a good review
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item and bad provided a good review. That is before I discovered that I am unable to charge my watch. The hole to place the round apple charger is too small, so you are not able to push the power source flush to the top, therefore, it holds the watch but no connection can be made. I tried pushing it so hard, I thought the cable was going to break and gave up trying to make it work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It does fall over when i am taking it on or off sometimes because the product is light weight
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lombard-Pertillar

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure why I hadn't thought of getting a stand for my apple watch (instead of using just the annoying charger on its own). After looking at a couple of products on Amazon and their reviews, I ended up choosing this one. Overall, I am so happy with this product. IT makes charging so much easier and it looks so much nicer. I'm just mad I didn't buy this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done but improvements could be done
customer_reviews.text: The clip that holds the charging cable in place on the back of this stand broke off after only a few days of owning this. The stand itself in my opinion is too light weight and easily falls over. It does the job but there could be some improvements to make this a more functional and efficient charging dock.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This Apple-Watch stand/charger was bought for my 12 year old granddaughter and she loves it. She sent me a picture and said that the watch stand looks so nice and it helps to keep her desk neat without the cord laying across the worktop. She chose the gray color.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: wouldn’t buy ...
customer_reviews.text: junk ... wouldn’t advise purchasing. doesn’t stay standing and doesn’t charge the watch. more than 1/2 the time the watch is not charged after being on the stand with charger all night. terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I got into the ugly habit of not even charging my Apple Watch on some days because the charger ALWAYS fell off of my nightstand and I got so annoyed that I wouldn’t even pick it up. Sometimes I even went out in public with a dead watch because of this! This stand works perfectly because I never forget to lay it on the stand and charge it. It is so easy to pop the charger in the stand. The design is very nice and sleek, and it is also very stable. Great for the price, would recommend to anyone with an Apple Watch.
customer_reviews.author: Kailah Santana

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice looking and practical stand for the iWatch
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice looking and practical stand for the iWatch. I found that when using it with the large size men's watch with stainless steel bracelet it tended to roll forward and fall due to its rounded front edge. I added a square piece of 1/4" plexiglass to the base which made much more stable. Otherwise I would have given it the full five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Angus

customer_reviews.title: Apple Watch stand
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect charger for your Apple Watch. Small and sturdy. Takes up practically no space. Easy for traveling. There are more expensive options there that do the absolute same thing. Why pay more. I’m very satisfied with this stand and i highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Patty Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great product you never knew you needed....
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! I bought this and a watch cover before my watch arrived so I could be 'ready', and I'm so glad I did. The stand is sturdy - although it can be prone to tipping if you're not careful. It also helps me use my watch like a clock at night since I charge it every night. Have used it over a month and it is good as new and the price was more than fair.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, convenient, space saver, good quality, and works well. I would not definitely not hesitate to buy this product. I am very happy that I now have this product on my desk. It will also make a great place to store your watch on your nightstand.
customer_reviews.author: STZ

customer_reviews.title: 💕💕
customer_reviews.text: I adore this stand!! I got tired of leaving my watch on the nightstand (mostly scared it was going to fall), so I finally ordered this. It came exactly on time, and was packaged very nicely! It took almost no time to hook my charger to it, and I’ve been in love with it since! I would honestly recommend this product to anyone, especially students with limited desk/nightstand space! :)
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: iWatch Charger
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Watch has to be positioned perfectly to charge. If stand gets slightly bumped you may come back to a dead watch. Make sure your nightstand is very stable and heavy to a vapid this.
customer_reviews.author: John C. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Solid stand
customer_reviews.text: I use this stand for charging my light powered watch and this device holds it at an angle that keeps the face aimed at a light source.
customer_reviews.author: D. Corbishley

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: My husband got tired of my Apple Watch charger being by the sink in the bathroom (as well as a safety hazard) so he bought me this stand. My favorite color is gold, it works great and we are both extremely satisfied. It was easy to set up, simple and straightforward. We love it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: The product is ok.. Though the adhessive holder for the wires is not strong and it fell off after 2 days of use. Also, there are times that my watch don’t charge when it has a case. I stopped using it after using it for less than a week. The seller is accommodating and the product arrived quick!
customer_reviews.author: yel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little stand. Helps me remember to charge my watch. And it looks so elegant on my dresser. Feels very well made!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Hla

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Charging Accessory
customer_reviews.text: This stand is grand! haha! My apple charger popped right in and it worked like a charm to keep my watch elevated so I can use it as a clock on my bedside table while I sleep. It seems extremely well made, durable, functional, and looks great! I recommend this stand if you're looking for an inexpensive and stylish solution to keeping your Apple Watch from lying flat to charge.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel or the office
customer_reviews.text: I keep this one at the office in case I need to charge but the clip on the back has slipped off and the cord just hangs now. Outside of that the charger works great.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

product_meta.title: Apple Watch Stand-Tranesca Apple Watch charging stand for Series 5 / Series 4 / Series 3 / Series 2 / Series 1; 38mm/40mm/42mm/44mm Apple watch (Must have Apple watch Accessories)
feature_bullets: WORKS WITH APPLE WATCH SERIES 5/4/3/2/1 ! Compatible with Apple Watches/iWatch of all sizes, versions and styles (Tested with real Apple Watches; Apple Watch 38mm/40mm/42mm/44mm), Apple watch Series 1-2015, Apple watch Series 2-2016, Apple Watch Series 3-2017, Series 4 -2018 Series 5-2019 （basic/ sport / edition); Series 5 is the latest Apple Watch 2019 version just launched in September

Classy Apple Watch charger stand made of finely crafted aluminum; Comes in 4 different colors ( Silver,Gold, Rose Gold and Black); Works perfectly and a bed stand watch stand for apple watch; Fully compatible with nightstand mode of Apple watch. Tranesca Apple Watch Stand is a blend of great price, wide choice of color and superior quality

Tailor-made rubber Apple watch charger holder ensures a snug fit to your Apple watch charger; Specially designed Apple Watch cable holder tidies up your Apple Watch charger cable and makes the overall Apple watch charging setup easy and straight-forward; (See the product picture for more details)

Perfect solution as a bedside Apple watch night mode stand or an Apple Watch desk charging stand. Start charging automatically simply by putting your Apple watch on the stand ( You don't even need to buckle the Apple watch band). Night mode compatible but not necessary, because with the ergonomically designed angle, you can directly see the time and no longer needs to twist and turn your head to find out what the time is.
Hassle Free Product Support ! Does not include Apple Watch charger,Apple Watch cable or Apple watch itself
